title: Plumcube

media.caption: Visit the site
media.alt: Screencap of the plumcube demo interface

overview: A Compass extension for creating 3D cubes with Sass/CSS, built because it's hip to be square (and to learn some Sass tricks). The code used on the demo page to style the cube is available as a published gem that has been downloaded over 7,000 times. See the GitHub documentation for full installation instructions.
